title: Treasure from the sea
brief_description: The Dow-perfected process of manufacturing magnesium by using a formula in which sea-water is a component is shown in this film. The effects of a wider use of magnesium in industrial and domestic life are also shown, and the advantages for both producer and consumer are presented.
